fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 631: Eyisa, Goddess of Winter will always spawn.
- Factional roleblock
- Factional chat
- Town roles that roleblock can't spawn with the Everfrost.
- The Town will be notified that the eternal winter is coming at the beginning of Day 1.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who don't submit to the endless winter.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Eliminate all who don't submit to the endless winter.
